name: House of Arcane Treasures
description:
You play as Severine Walker, a girl whose parents went missing when you were less than a year old. On your fifteenth birthday, you inherit the key to their abandoned HOUSE. In exploring the mysterious artifacts scattered throughout the empty rooms, you hope to find some clue as to where your parents might have gone, and why they would have left behind the daughter they loved so much.

The downloadable files include the game as well as all music and artwork.

Art, Music, and Story by Kasha Prinzing
Programming by Arianna Ingalls
Made using JS-ViNE by J David Eisenberg
